text:
Today I wanted to show you the pirate captain
cake that I have just finished making for

We went to see the movie The Pirate; The Band
of Misfits with a couple of friends so we

I made some of the fondant details ahead to
make it easier like the buttons, the birds

beak and eyes, and the pirate captain's eyes
and also the sword and the buckle for the

belt so then the night before I could do all
the other bits which still took quite a while,

it would have been way too long a video to
film the whole thing so I have taken step

by step photos if you are interested in making
this cake or something similar, if you go

to howtocookthat.net and click on cakes you
will see step by step photos showing you how
to do each stage of it.

It is a chocolate cake covered in chocolate
buttercream and then covered in fondant.

Don't forget to click like, leave me a comment
or subscribe to this channel and check out
